Bootstrap CSS only

This is a Bower component for Bootstrap CSS and font libraries only. No javascript, and more importantly NO bower depenedency on jQuery. Perfect companion for Angular-UI Bootstrap.

With 3.0.1 and above, the glyphicons are included as well.

Installation:

bower install bootstrap-css-only

Previous Bootstrap versions also available:

You can request info for a specific version with â€˜bower info bootstrap-css-only#' ``` bower install bootstrap-css-only#2.3.2 bower install bootstrap-css-only#3.0.0 ... ```
